description: Fix issue with parts of a file being downloaded more than once when streaming to stdout (`issue 1087 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1087>`__)
Fix issue where requests were still trying to be signed even though user used the ``--no-sign-request`` flag. (`botocore issue 433 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/433>`__)
Fix invalid signatures when using the ``aws cloudsearchdomain search`` command (`issue 976 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/976>`__)
